Plot: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for nearly ten years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.
Title: The Santa Clause 2
Writer: Don Rhymer (screenplay), Cinco Paul (screenplay), Ken Daurio (screenplay), Ed Decter (screenplay), John J. Strauss (screenplay), Leo Benvenuti (characters), Steve Rudnick (characters), Leo Benvenuti (story), Steve Rudnick (story)
Actors: Tim Allen, Elizabeth Mitchell, David Krumholtz, Eric Lloyd
tomatoConsensus: Though it's harmless as family entertainment and has moments of charm, The Santa Clause 2 is also predictable and forgettable.
